ItemTooltips.vitality_booster: This will give you extra health because of Spectre's frail situation. It may not be needed, hence situational.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Spectre suffers during the laning phase and needs the Poor Man's Shield to actively farm and reduce the amount of damage intake from harassment.
ItemTooltips.heart: We typically get Heart of Tarrasque to survive longer, letting Dispersion to its job.
ItemTooltips.radiance: If you can farm this, get it! Otherwise, your mid-game core item of Diffusal Blade will greatly help you pick off foes with Haunt and Diffusal Blade's slow.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Health from Heart of Tarrasque and Evasion from Butterfly makes Spectre an incredible annoyance and nearly unkillable before Spectre dies.
ItemTooltips.manta: Definitely a good item with Diffusal Blade and your passive abilities. Dish out further damage as you gank foes and pop Manta Style to be triple the threat.
ItemTooltips.diffusal_blade: Get level 2 if you run out of Diffusal charges, this is a great item when you are ganking for lonely supports or weakened lane-pushers.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: The survivability, aura and extra speed are intermission items to keep Spectre alive and make early ganks all the more worthwhile for him.

AbilityTooltips.spectre_spectral_dagger: Spectral Dagger can also be used to get out of ganks and dangerous areas. You can go through trees and hills with this ability and following the path.
AbilityTooltips.spectre_desolate: This ability works great when you're ganking enemies via Haunt. We max this second as we ramp up ganks and the use of our Diffusal Blade.
AbilityTooltips.spectre_dispersion: The longer you stay alive, the more damage you can deal to others. Consider getting more health-related items if you want to take advantage of this.
AbilityTooltips.spectre_haunt: Cast Haunt to gank heroes who are farming alone as you can take them out fast. In addition, consider Haunt as a Boots of Travel whereas you can push another lane and use Haunt to get in on team-fights without delay! There is no cooldown to the number of times you can use Reality, so use it often!
